name: Hamster Wheel
lines: Generate <font color='green'>$$</font> every 10 seconds if your pet isn't tired

name: Slot Machine
lines: Gives an increase to money per second based on health and gives <font color='green'>$$$</font> whenever your pet contracts a disease. No reward without risk!
(+$2.5/s and +10% income for every 25% health missing), 100$ per disease contracted

name: Enclosure Decor
lines: Makes your pet feel cozy in their home. Look varies with species

name: Laundering Business
lines: 30% chance to gain <font color='green'>$$</font> every 20 seconds

name: Gloob Cloning
lines: Using cloning technology give your Gloob their own Gloob, giving them the same experience you're going through
+$2/s, every minute the cloned Gloob changes between the 'DEAD' and 'ALIVE' state at a 50% chance. Every 20 seconds, either gain or lose 15 Happiness depending on the state of the cloned Gloob

name: A Whole Fucking Chicken
lines: How did it get here??? the eggs sell doe
